#summary Compiling
= How to compile P3DFFT =
_Note: You must load the module fftw first!_
./configure --with-fftw=<path to FFTW3 library> FCFLAGS=<Fortran compiler flags> CFLAGS=<C compiler flags> LDFLAGS=<libraries to link>

=== How to compile on Triton using PGI ===
./configure --with-fftw="/opt/pgi/fftw_pgi" FCFLAGS="-fastsse -tp barcelona-64 -Mextend -byteswapio" CFLAGS="-fastsse -tp barcelona-64 -DPGI" LDFLAGS="-lmpi_f90 -lmpi_f77 -pgf90libs -lmyriexpress"

=== How to compile on TACC using PGI ===
_Note: You must load the module fftw3 first!_
./configure --with-fftw="$TACC_FFTW3_DIR" FCFLAGS="-fastsse -tp barcelona-64 -Mextend -byteswapio" CFLAGS="-fastsse -tp barcelona-64 -DPGI" LDFLAGS="-pgf90libs -lmyriexpress"
